title: Figma Plugins
description: Boost your Figma workflow with essential plugins. Discover time-saving tools for icons, accessibility testing, color generation, image handling, and design automation. Enhance your Figma experience with plugins like Iconify, Unsplash, and Material Design Icons.

resources.title: A11y - Color Contrast Checker
resources.description: Ensure your text is readable for users by adhering to WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) standards.

resources.title: Color Blind
resources.description: Color Blind allows you to view your designs in the 8 different types of color vision deficiencies.

resources.title: Color Designer
resources.description: The plugin generates shades, tints, and color harmonies based on select layers or local styles. You can also create a stepped gradient between two colors.

resources.title: Iconify
resources.description: Import Material Design Icons, FontAwesome, Jam Icons, EmojiOne, Twitter Emoji and many other icons (more than 100 icon sets containing over 100,000 icons) to Figma document as vector shapes.

resources.title: Image Palette
resources.description: Extracts a colour palette of 5 different colours from the selected images.

resources.title: Insert Big Image
resources.description: Insert and retain the original resolution of big images.

resources.title: Layout Grid Visualizer
resources.description: Generate layers from your layout grids so you can export images or prepare diagrams to supplement your design systems documentation.

resources.title: Material Design Icons
resources.description: Instant easy access to the entire Material Design Icons library. 35,000+ icons in PNG and SVG at your fingertips.

resources.title: Styler
resources.description: Styler unlocks the ability to manage multiple styles at once by using modifying the layer properties.

resources.title: UI Faces
resources.description: UI Faces aggregates thousands of avatars which you can carefully filter to create your perfect personas or just generate random avatars.

resources.title: Unsplash
resources.description: Insert beautiful images from Unsplash straight into your designs.
